channel.title: R Markdown on Xiuyuan's website

item.title: Greg Dignon
item.description: Background Greg is a PhD student in Chemical Engineering with a focus on intrinsically disordered proteins, and is a good friend of mine. Both of us are music lovers, although he likes heavy metal, while I prefer classical and romantic. But it seems that we have the same taste for Christian music. Interview Could you give us a summary for your research interest? Simulations of unfolded and intrinsically disordered proteins.
